Text:
So, what's the quality of this file?

Why all the negative quality tags?

This has 2 Russian soundtracks, so streaming through a Network Blu Ray player, plays Russian and not English, I had to use a program to remove the russian, now it plays ok :)
Thats prob why the negative comments
Yep, you can remove or add srt-files with the program MKVMERGE. A free download, search bij Google.
